mapper.insert: INSERT INTO A_ORDER (ORDER_NO, USER_ID, ORDER_DATE, STATUS, ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE, ORDER_TOTAL_QUANTITY) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, 'N', #{orderTotalPrice}, #{orderTotalQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT O.USER_ID, O.ORDER_NO FROM A_ORDER O WHERE USER_ID = ${userId} AND O.ORDER_DATE = (SELECT MAX(O2.ORDER_DATE) FROM A_ORDER O2 WHERE O2.USER_ID = O.USER_ID)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL ( USER_ID, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_SEQ, ORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, ORDER_DETAIL_PRICE, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{orderNo}, #{productSeq}, #{orderDetailQuantity}, #{orderDetailPrice}, 'N' )

INSERT INTO PAY (ORDER_NO, USER_ID, PAY_REAL_PRICE, PAY_POINT_PRICE, PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, STATUS, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{payRealPrice}, #{payPointPrice}, #{payTotalPrice}, 'N', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_SEQ, NVL(P.PRODUCT_QUANTITY,'') AS PRODUCT_QUANTITY, NVL(O.ORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY,'') AS ORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY FROM PRODUCT P, ORDER_DETAIL O WHERE O.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND P.PRODUCT_SEQ = O.PRODUCT_SEQ
